name: We Three Kings
description:
On a chilly winter night you receive a mysterious message informing you of the arrival of The Child.  With only the Star to guide you, you and your companions are on a race to find The Child and present your gifts.

Are you a trio of mobsters bringing tribute to the firstborn of the head of the "family"?

Are you one of the kids in your class who was cast as a "wise man" in the school play and now you have to find the stolen baby Jesus before the play starts?

All of these adventures are possible, and more, with the We Three Kings one page tabletop role-playing adventure.  

Celebrate the season with an adventure collaboratively created by the players.  The mission is simple but the journey may take a turn...

Let us know @inkbornstudio on twitter or inkborn.studio on instagram how your game went!

Have questions about the game?  DM us at either twitter or instagram and we'll get right back to you.
